 left: `"ğŸ¦€"`,
right: `"ğŸŸ"`: ferris is not a fish', src/main.rs:2:5

æ­£å¦‚ RFC 3184 ä¸­æ‰€æè­°çš„ï¼ŒLocalKey<Cell<T>>å’ŒLocalKey<RefCell<T>>ç¾åœ¨å¯ä»¥ç›´æ¥ä½¿ç”¨get()ã€set()ã€take()å’Œreplace()æ–¹æ³•é€²è¡Œæ“ä½œï¼Œè€Œç„¡éœ€åƒä¸€èˆ¬LocalKeyå·¥ä½œé‚£æ¨£è·³éwith(|inner| ...)é–‰åŒ…ã€‚LocalKey<T>æ˜¯thread_local!statics çš„é¡å‹ã€‚

fnf() {
    // before:

    // now:

    // ...// before:let v = THINGS.with(|i| i.take());
    // now:let v: Vec<i32> = THINGS.take();
}
